website_summaries.verdict: Work with ease as this heavy-duty 16-inch chainsaw has a chain break to provide kickback protection when stopping and starting the chain.
pros: Kickback protection on Oregon bar and chain
Less maintenance than a gas-powered chainsaw
cons: Narrow gage chain used to reduce power required is more fragile than other options

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased with this so far
customer_reviews.text: Extremely pleased with this so far. I have felled and cut up some trees with about 14" base diameters. I own a larger Stihl gas powered but it looks like I will only be using it on much larger trees or bigger cutting projects. But so far the battery in the Dewalt will outlast my energy, especially in this warmer weather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this tool!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chainsaw for all the electric reasons and COULD NOT BE HAPPIER. I have the 7.5 amp battery which lasts as long as I do these days. By the time I've finished my malty beverage, the battery is charged in my vehicle and off we go for another 1/4 chord. I also bought the 40-volt line trimmer to make use of the same battery and the 2 tools are a GREAT combination. My original intention was to return this tool if it did not meet ALL of my requirements, but it is definitely staying! Cheers,
customer_reviews.author: Lefty

customer_reviews.title: Good smaller electric chain saw
customer_reviews.text: I bought the saw separate and got the expensive 7.5 amp battery. I used it a lot this summer on only one charge. It does use quite a lot of chain oil and leaks a bit as other review mentioned. I keep it on a door mat so that is not a big factor. DeWalt is a good brand and I will likely add other items that use 40 volt batteries such as a trimmer and maybe a blower. Unfortunately, the 20 volt line is much larger and more popular due to price etc. which is another slight downside.
customer_reviews.author: B. K. Wallen

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love the ease of use, and how quiet it is compared to gas-powered ones. Other than bar oil, no need to deal with gas, additives, or bad gas and trying to get it started. Charge the battery and it stays charged for months until it's needed. I usually keep it in the trunk for road-rage incidents.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Check bar oil and tighten blade the throw out you gas saws
customer_reviews.text: Great tool I have 3 gas saws and they are rotting in my shed haven’t started them since I got this baby. I had a mini tornado come through my farm maybe 25-30 trees 12”-16”came down Cherry Loucast Sasafrass took care of all of them along with a 14” double maple that took out my friendsToyota.
customer_reviews.author: Motorboat

customer_reviews.title: Very good chainsaw, Battery didn’t last as long
customer_reviews.text: Very good chainsaw, Battery didn’t last as long, i could only cut 2 medium sized queen palm before the battery died
customer_reviews.author: Dollar

customer_reviews.title: So good
customer_reviews.text: Great chainsaw. Great battery life and power! The day I got this I cut down the equivalent of the Amazon rainforest on my 2acre property. Only thing that stinks about it is I now have a bunch of homeless orangutans and sloths hanging around the pool.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable tool - really works!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought it would work as good as it does. Battery lasts, cuts like a gas Saw and it’s quite and safer!
customer_reviews.author: WebGuy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent power and ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Excellent power and ease of use. I haven't used it long enough yet to run down the battery, but I did about an hour of arbor work and used only 1/4 charge, according to the charge indicator.
customer_reviews.author: Erich Blohm

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I've used this chainsaw hundreds of times and it's out performed my expectations. Love it. Only thing I recommend is stopping every few minutes to check the chain tension. Gets too loose and it cuts up the inside pretty good. But that's my fault.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: THE SAW A CYBER NINJA WOULD USE
customer_reviews.text: (I will be updating as time goes on) First day: Cut a whole bunch of wood I hand laying around. Battery had a significant charge out of the box. User manual is thin and to the point. Easy to use for the, dumb lumberjack (i.e. Like myself). I found some neighborhood unclaimed fire wood (about 10 inches thick) I made several cuts and it operated flawless.
customer_reviews.author: COMPUTER NINJAS

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: I trimmed trees all day at my Mom's and 7.5 Amp Hour battery still had 3 out of 4 bars. I am 56 years old and not as fast as I used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chainsaw with very good battery life
customer_reviews.text: The chain saw is powerful but relatively quiet. It works as well as the gas chain saws I have owned. Now I don't have to be concerned about Spring time start up or having to deal with gas-oil mixtures or tuning carburetors.
customer_reviews.author: TFMDOC

customer_reviews.title: One of my best investments ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have used my Dewalt Chainsaw quite a bit and I have been nothing short of impressed so far. I cant make brand comparisons, but this is one of the best tools Ive ever owned so far. Great machine!
customer_reviews.author: Will Pappan

customer_reviews.title: Faster chain speed, best match with big battery
customer_reviews.text: 40V has superior chain speed which translates to safer smoother use
customer_reviews.author: @IvyReising

customer_reviews.title: Great saw
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful saw. Everything as promised. Battery life is good for 1hr of serious cutting but no more. It's all I need.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for work around home!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for light work around home. Reliable, easy to use, super long lasting. Battery works with other Dewalt lawn equipment, blower, trimmer, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Cuts like a champ!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. No fuel to worry about. No pulling your arm out of socket to get to start. Lite weight. Battery last long enough to cut up a mature tree!
customer_reviews.author: Boomer

customer_reviews.title: Love it...
customer_reviews.text: Love it... great for homeowners. The gas one is out!
customer_reviews.author: DWF

customer_reviews.title: Great adition to the Dewalt line of yard tools.
customer_reviews.text: I use the Dewalt Blower and trimmer, this saw is a great addition to this line up .
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Buy bigger battery or come with away to charge battery buy extra chain
customer_reviews.text: Camping cut a full 16inch pine tree with this works great bogs down a bit but if u let the saw do its job works great love it
customer_reviews.author: Austin Summers

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again!!!
customer_reviews.text: An amazing tool! I will never purchase a gas saw again!
customer_reviews.author: Trevor T.

customer_reviews.title: DeWalt Chain saw arrived this morning, on time. No damage.
customer_reviews.text: Battery power operated. No fuel, low level noise, no cord.
customer_reviews.author: Der Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT MAIL VIA AIR!
customer_reviews.text: Please, for the love of god and all that is holy... DO NOT MAIL THIS via air! Yes, you *can* sneak it past USPS mail clerks... but understand that *if* in the unlikely situation that something goes wrong with a battery this size (Lithium Ion, specifically) that it WILL create a thermite reaction and take down a plane!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Langston

product_meta.title: DEWALT DCCS690X1 40V Chainsaw 7.5AH
product_meta.description: The DEWALT DCCS690X1 40V MAX Brushless Chainsaw delivers the performance of gas with the convenience of battery. Equipped with a powerful brushless motor and a 16" bar, this chainsaw glides through a variety of cutting diameters with the cut speed of gas, and reliability of battery-powered equipment. For optimal convenience, the unit features auto-oiling with Lubri Link and Lubri Well delivering smooth cuts, long chain life and reduced maintenance. The Tool-Free tensioning system allows for quick bar and chain adjustments with no additional tools required. Chain brake for kick back protection. Part of the 40V MAX system of Outdoor Power Equipment. Backed by DEWALT's 3 year limited warranty. Includes: (1) DCCS690 Brushless Chainsaw, (1) 40V MAX 7.5AH Lithium Ion battery, (1) DCCS690 Brushless Chainsaw, (1) Standard Charger, (1) Bar Sheath.
feature_bullets: Chain brake for kick back protection with 16" Oregon Bar and chain
Auto-Oiling with and for continuous lubrication. Quarter-turn oil cap for quick oil refills
Tool-free chain tensioning and Bar tightening knob for proper Bar clamping force
Variable speed trigger for full power control
High-efficiency Brushless motor maximizing run time and motor life

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars41 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
